body: At 9th level, an arctic druid can see normally in ice storm, sleet storm, or similar natural snowstorms. In addition, she can prepare any druid spell with the fire subtype as a cold spell, with an identical effect but inflicting cold damage instead of fire damage. This ability replaces venom immunity.
name: Snowcaster
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Arctic Druid/Snowcaster
